original_title: ใหม่กะหม่ำโดนกะโดน
overview: People who are both right and wrong Will there be a  problem in the world that is Mai, The most sour girl has questioned herself since high school until she passed the university, crossed her age until now. I still haven't seen any young man who is sincere and true love. Other than the birth father, all men are bad as well - flirtatious. Fortunately, in this life there is also Mum, a best friend who always takes a new wing every time you get drunk from the heartbreak from all the men that come into your life.
title: Mai Ka Mum
